name: When Night Comes (itch)
description:
A night call, a missing person and... a especial mission?
Maybe some doors need to be open today.

Game made in 5 days on Global Game Jam Online 2021

Special thanks to Gabriel Pereira and Anna Jurazecki for the voice over and Pedro Bara for letting us use his music.
Link for the music: https://open.spotify.com/track/6p00GUEmUFukNqEtTWMBke
